Description.Text: Well Hotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20 is situated in the heart of Bangkok on Sukhumvit 20 Road. It is a 235-key property with five room categories. All rooms and suites are featured with mini-bars, personal electronic safety box, 46-inch smart TV, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi throughout and LAN cable in room. Both Executive Rooms and Executive Suites are fitted with private exercise bikes to accommodate health loving travellers with electronic weight scale. In addition, microwave and printer are provided in all Executive Suites. Well Hotel Bangkok is a lifestyle wellness hotel that is not only aiming to deliver lifestyle experience and relationship with the nearby neighborhood but also being dedicated to well-balanced combination of comfort and style as well as friendly service.

Located in the heart of Sukhumvit, Well Hotel Bangkok is within a walking distance from BTS Skytrain (Asok Station), MRT Subway (Sukhumvit Station), Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre, The Emporium, The EmQuartier and Terminal 21 Mall. The hotel is very well connected as it provides easy access to different areas in Bangkok. Central Embassy Shopping Centre, MBK, Siam Paragon, Silom and Sathorn business districts, Chatuchak Weekend Market and the Chao Praya River are all accessible by BTS Skytrain.

Eat Well Café - Dine healthy in a cozy ambience, Eat Well Café is an all- day dining featuring authentic Thai and delicious Asian fusion delights with fresh ingredients. The restaurant offers healthy menu and food therapy concept for those who seek healthy dining option. Breakfast is served here daily. The Twist Bar & Bistro - The Twist Bar & Bistro is a perfect place where one can come with a special someone for an intimate dinner, or with friends just to hang out for a chat, delicious food and tasty drinks. The restaurant has a touch of Art Deco design with modern twist evoking the glamour and romance of the Prohibition-Era style of the twenties and early thirties. Besides the comfortable and cosy dining area inside, The Twist Bar & Bistro also offers an outdoor terrace for those would like to watch what goes around and the passer-by. Pool Bar - Chill out at our Pool Bar with a delightful mix of cocktails, juices, healthy drinks, snacks and light meals.
This accommodation has a medium lobby.
